translation.en: [Bert] When I was 22, I got involved with the Russian mafia.
translation.zh: 我22岁时和俄罗斯黑手党打过交道

translation.en: I went to school at Florida State. I was not a very good student.
translation.zh:
我当时在佛罗里达州立大学读书
不怎么算好学生

translation.en: This is how bad I was.
I signed up for a Russian class one time, thinking it was Spanish.
translation.zh: 我有次报了俄语课 以为是西语课

translation.en: And it took me three classes before I realized,
-"I don't think this is Spanish." -[audience laughs]
So I took Russian 1, 2, 3, and 4, never learned a fucking word.
translation.zh:
我上完了俄语一到四
一个词都没学会 （莫斯科）

translation.en: The end of Russian 4, same teacher pulls me aside.
translation.zh:
俄语四结课时
那个老师把我拉到一边

translation.en: She's like, "Yo, we're taking a trip to Russia.
If you go, you'll get a minor."
translation.zh: 如果你去 即可视为完成了辅修”

translation.en: I was like, "Strasvutsia, bitches, I'm back!"
translation.zh:
我心想：“泥豪 婊子们
我回来了！”

translation.en: We went to Russia. The Russian mob ran everything.
translation.zh: 我们去了俄罗斯 那里是黑帮的天下

translation.en: And they told us that our first night.
translation.zh: 第一天晚上我们就领教到了

translation.en: I'm in the back of the class like, "This trip just got fucking awesome."
translation.zh:
我在班级后排
心想“这旅行真带劲” （沃尔戈维奇赌场）

translation.en: Then, like, in exchange for our money, they gave us two young gangsters.
translation.zh:
他们拿了我们的钱
换了两个年轻的匪徒给我们

translation.en: The word for that in Russian is "banditti."
translation.zh: 在俄语里 匪徒叫“班迪提”

translation.en: [continues on TV] So I ended up befriending the banditti.
translation.zh: 最后我和班迪提成了朋友

translation.en: Then, one night, the whole class is taking an overnight train trip to Moscow.
translation.zh:
有天晚上
我们全班坐夜班火车去莫斯科

translation.en: We roll to the bar car like a big dick in a locker room.
translation.zh:
我们就像更衣室里的大屌男
趾高气昂地冲向酒吧车厢

translation.en: Just, not that I've ever been that guy, but I've seen it.

translation.en: So the banditti says to me,
translation.zh: 于是 那个班迪提对我说

translation.en: "Don't worry. When it gets dark, we have good time."
translation.zh: “别担心 天黑后就好玩了”

translation.en: I'm like, "What are we doing when it gets dark?"
translation.zh: 我问：“天黑后我们玩什么？”

translation.en: Reaches into his pocket, pulls a ring of keys out.
translation.zh: 他把手伸进口袋 拿出一串钥匙

translation.en: He goes, "We're robbing the whole fucking train."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们要洗劫整列火车”

translation.en: I'm a good per-- I'm an okay person.
My point is, we fucking robbed them.
translation.zh: 重点是 我们他妈的抢劫了

translation.en: We robbed the whole train, and then we drank hard as shit.
translation.zh: 我们洗劫了整列火车 喝了好多酒

translation.en: Pull in to Moscow at 6 a.m., hammered, piss drunk. Train stops.

早上六点到莫斯科时
我们已烂醉如泥 火车停了

translation.en: My whole class, they're in their pajamas.
They're upset. They've been robbed. I get it.

translation.en: They look at me and look at each other and they're like, "Fuck it! He's the Machine!"

他们看向我 继而面面相觑
似乎在说：“该死！他是机器！”
